title: Firefox opened with a set of questions. Now all of my shortcuts have disappeared and I can't get them back.
content:
Firefox opened with a set of questions just now. I did what was appropriate then it was like FF reset. All of my home page shortcut boxes were gone and I want them back. FF/Mozilla sent a verification code to my email. I typed the url for my gmail account and FF did nothing. A page came up with the url and it was blank. The tab had an icon grayed out and the page was blank. So I had to go to Edge to sign in to my gmail to get the code. I am at work. I do not have time to search through a plethora of articles trying to find how to get my shortcuts back. Why did they go away in the first place. This is maddening. I've used FF for years and it has always been simple. I just need an answer to what should be a simple question.

Thanks in advance for your help.
creator: becky.pottsbaker

title: firefox fox consuming a lot of memory and processing when the computer is not in use
content:
firefox fox consuming a lot of memory and processing when the computer is not in use... it is becoming impossible to use because after we leave the notebook on standby it begins to consume memory and processing that doesn't stop, only ending when closes the application... whereas it was supposed to be the opposite if the computer is not in use, it was supposed to stabilize or even reduce memory and processing consumption... Firefox wasn't like that, what did you do?

title: Firefox Crashing
content:
Greetings,

My Firefox keeps crashing randomly even though it's a new PC with very capable good hardware. My old laptop used to run 100s of tabs without any issues.

However, on this new PC, the crashes are fucked even though I barely have about 20 tabs open.

title: Firefox crashes on launch (Mac Catalina0
content:
After completely removing all Firefox/mozill files both FF 12 and Extended release continue to crash on launch after reinstalling.

ff suddenly stopped working after no known changes when I turned my computer back on.

Please advise?

title: My old data or passwords
content:
Subject: Assistance Required - Account Access Issue

Dear [Mozilla Firefox],

I hope this email finds you well. My name is [uxman zidi], and I am writing to seek assistance with my Mozilla account. I have encountered an issue where, upon logging in recently, I noticed that all my passwords, links, and emails have disappeared. There seems to be a discrepancy in the account data.

I have been a regular user of Mozilla, and such an issue has never occurred before. I rely on this account for various purposes, and the missing information is causing inconvenience. I have checked my account settings and security measures, but the problem persists.

Could you please investigate this matter and provide guidance on how to recover my account data? I appreciate your prompt attention to this issue and any assistance you can provide in resolving it.

Thank you for your time and assistance.

Sincerely, [uxman zidi] [removed email and phone# from public support forum]
creator: uxmanzidi143

title: How do I detect FireFox Pop-Up blocker in code and notify visitors that they need to disable the FireFox pop-up blocker to enable Search to function with the ENTER KEY and not only the magnifying Glass Icon?
content:
Hi,

ONLY FireFox blocks using the ENTER key to launch a SEARCH on my website - (which is strangely allowed by FF IF I manually disable pop-up blocking)!

So, then how do I detect FireFox Pop-Up blocker in code on my website pages that include searches (just for FF visitors) and notify those visitors using FF that they need to disable the FireFox pop-up blocker to enable Search to function with the ENTER KEY and not only the magnifying Glass Icon (without using a pop-up notification - which will obviously be blocked by the FF pop-up blocker), please?

Sounds like mission impossible - for a "pop-up block" of what actually is NOT a pop-up (while every other browser happily allows search with an ENTER key)?

Or can FF possibly just FIX the pop-up blocking code to allow Search with an ENTER key (like all the other browsers do), PLEASE?
creator: alan.holm
